page1.title: HEADER
page1.tf0:
Semboller ekrandaki her yere ödeme yapar. Bir spinin sonunda ekrandaki aynı sembolün toplam
sayısı, kazanma değerini belirler.
page1.item2:
These are the WIlD symbols
and substitutes for all symbols
except for BONUS symbol.
They can appear on reels 2, 3 and 4.
page1.item3:
This is the BONUS symbol.
It can appear on all reels.

page2.title: WILD WITH MULTIPLIER
page2.tf0:
At any spin all WILD symbols that hit on screen can
carry a random multiplier of 2x, 3x, 5x, or 10x.
The Split WILD symbol can carry a random multiplier
on each side Multipliers apply to winning combinations
that they are part of. If there are multiple multiplier
part of the same winning combinations
they are added together
page2.tf2:
Hit 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS symbols to trigger
the FREE SPINS round and win 10, 15 or 25
free spins respectively. During the round
hit 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS symbols to retrigger
the feature and win 10, 15 or 25 more free spins respectively.
Special reels are in play during the free spins round.
page2.tf4:
The maximum win amount is limited to 14,000x bet
in both base game and free spins. If the total win of a
FREE SPINS round reaches 14,000x bet the round
immediately ends, win is awarded and all remaining
free spins are forfeited
page2.tf6:
The FREE SPINS round can be instantly triggered
from the base game by buying it for 100x current total bet.
When buying the FREE SPINS round, on the triggering spin
3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS symbols can hit randomly.
During the round hit 2, 3, 4 or 5 or more BONUS
symbols to retrigger the feature and win 3,
10, 15, 25 or more free spin respectively.

page3.title: FREE SPINS RULES
page3.tf0:
The FREESPIN FEATURE is awarded when 4 or more
SCATTER symbols hit anywhere on the screen.
The round starts with 15 free spins.
page3.tf1:
During the FREE SPINS round, whenever a MULTIPLIER
symbol hits and the spin results in a win, the MULTIPLIER
value gets added to the total multiplier.
For the whole duration of the round, whenever any new MULTIPLIER symbol
hits and results in a win, the total multiplier value
is also used to multiply the win.
page3.tf2:
When 3 or more SCATTER symbols hit during
the FREE SPIN ROUND, 5 additional freespins are awarderd.
Special reels are in play during FREE SPIN ROUND
page3.tf4:
The player has the option to select the bet amount
by 9625, increasing the bet per line by 25x. Playing with
an active ante bet increases the chances of catching
Scatter symbols.

page4.title: GAME RULES
page4.tf0:
High volatility games pay out
less often on average but the chance to hit big wins
in a short time span is higher.
page4.tf1:
Symbols pay anywhere.
All wins are multiplied by the base bet.
page4.tf2: All values are expressed as actual wind in coins.
page4.tf3:
When winning with multiple symbols,
all wins are added to the total win.
page4.tf4:
Free spins is awarded to the player after
the round completes. The total win from past
Freespins includes the total win of the series.
page4.tf5:
The theoretical RTP of this game is 96.506. 
When using "ANTE BET," the RTP of the game is 96.506.
page4.tf7: Any malfunction voids all pays and plays.

page5.title: HOW TO PLAY

textCombined1.part2:
buttons to change the bet value
and open the bet menu.

page5.tf1: Select the bet you want to use in the game.

textCombined2.part1: Opens the SETTINGS menu contains settings

page5.tf3: which affect the way the game is being played.
page5.tf4:
The CREDIT and BET labels display
the current balance and the total bet. 
Click on the labels to switch between token
view and cash view.

textCombined4.part2: You can use the buttons to increase

page5.tf5:
or decrease the current bet and make bet adjustments and
open the betting menu where you can make
changes to your bets.
page5.tf6:
You can use the buttons to move
the current bet up or down and open the betting menu 
where you can change bet allocations.

page6.title: SETTINGS MENU
page6.tf0:
INTRO SCREEN - toggles the introductory screen
on and off
AMBIENCE - toggles the ambient sound and music in
the game on and off
SOUND EFFECTS - Turns the game's sound effects
on and off
GAME HISTORY - Opens the game history page
page6.tf3:
The bet menu shows the bet multiplier available
in the game, and the current
total bet in both coins and cash.
page6.tf4: COIN VALUE fields to change the values.
page6.tf5:
The maximum win amount
is limited to 5000 times the bet.
page6.tf6:
A round yields up to 4 DP,
and all remaining features are lost.

page1.title: GAME RULES
page1.tf0:
Symbols pay anywhere on the screen. 
The total number of the same symbol on the screen at the end of a spin determines the value of the win.
page1.item2:
These are the WIlD symbols
and substitutes for all symbols
except for BONUS symbol.
They can appear on reels 2, 3 and 4.
page1.item3:

It can appear on all reels.

Multipliers apply to winning combinations that they are part of. If there are multiple multiplier part of the same
winning combinations they are added together
